settings.title: Your Trusted Partner in Soft Furnishings

settings.editor: At Venus Global Sdn Bhd, we've been delivering quality soft furnishings since 2009. Originally supplying curtains and blinds to hospitals, we've grown into a one-stop supplier for hotels, offices, and residental spaces. We take pride in our diverse range of high-quality products that enhance both style and functionality, all while prioritizing customer satisfaction. Discover how we can meet your soft furnishing needs with excellence.

Create your ideal curtain set with Venus Curtain's selection of fabrics and styles. From classic pleats to modern sheers, we have everything you need to craft a look that's uniquely yours. Let us help you bring your vision to life!

settings.title: Enhance Patient Privacy with Our Hospital Curtains

settings.editor: Our cubicle curtains and tracks are the perfect solution for medical facilities with limited space and budgets. Ideal for hospitals, clinics, and treatment centers, they ensure patient privacy and comfort. Transform your space with our reliable and stylish curtain solutions today.

Explore our collection of contemporary panel blinds, ideal for blocking light and mantaining privacy in larger windows. Our selection includes Zebra Blinds, Venetian Blinds, and Eco Print Blinds, offering versatile solutions that blend style and functionality for any space.
Elevate your space with sleek blinds that balance style and functionality
Transform your windows with chic blinds that enhance privacy and style.
Light control made stylist: discover the beauty of our modern blinds.

Experience the perfect blend of craftmanship and modern design with our custom upholstery services. We focus on creating high-quality, handmade cushions and upholstery for sofas and commercial furniture. Whether it's a repair or a complete makeover, we're here to help you achieve the look and comfort you desire.
